title: Office app: Microsoft Office Default change â€“ Blocking VBA macros in files from the internet
description:
To help improve security, we are changing the behavior of Office applications to block macros in files from the internet.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-365-blog/helping-users-stay-safe-blocking-internet-macros-by-default-in/ba-p/3071805
